thread.title: We Had 10 Illustrators Draw the "Bowling Green Massacre"
thread.title_full: We Had 10 Illustrators Draw the "Bowling Green Massacre"

author: The Creators Project
title: We Had 10 Illustrators Draw the "Bowling Green Massacre"
text:
The Creators Project â€” Feb 3 2017 
Last night on MSNBC, White House Counselor Kellyanne Conway justified President Trump's refugee ban by citing a tragedy the liberal media isn't talking about: The Bowling Green Massacre. 
Just to make that clear: on national TV, an official Counselor to the President of the United States finally blew the whistle, "I bet it's brand-new information to people that President Obama had a six-month ban on the Iraqi refugee program after two Iraqis came to this country, were radicalized, and then were the masterminds behind the Bowling Green massacre. Most people didn't know that because it didn't get covered." 
Uncovered, no longer: We tracked down 10 artists who were actually present at the Bowling Green Massacre, and asked them to draw the events exactly as they remember it. 
Wrecks T.L. Arson
